transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Arun sir Sandhya baat kar rahi thi Indiamart ke office se senior manager.
Customer: Boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Dekhiye ek to baat khullam khullam ekta baat kar raha hai aap log ko Indiamart ka koi business policy nahi hai.
Aap dete hai calcutta mein itna bricks lagega ye size ka brick jarurat hai 10000 hai 2000 hai 1000 hai lekin jab hum contact buyer jab mangta hai kuch nahi bolta hai.
Executive: Achcha matlab buyer aap se discussion nahi kar rahe hai aap ye baat keh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan buyer ke sath baat nahi hota hai to kya karega dekhne se dekhne se.
Executive: Par sir mobile numbers to aapke paas present rehte hai na udhar.
Customer: Haan aapko ekdum last side mein aapko 09696 number ekta rehta hai wo number mein manne se usko kya malum hoga kaun sa bricks hum de sakta hai malum hoga.
Ye to hamara kya ho raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi main samajh gayi aapki problem aapko main abhi pata hai kya required hai sir ek bar na aapko hum proper guidance de dete hain kahan se aapko buyer ko.
Customer: Kya karta hai aap log hamare sath aise kyun majburi karta hai hum bolta hai contact buyer contact buyer ke jab mangta hai koi nahi aata hai lekin last mein aapko aisa number aata hai 096969.
Wo manne se kya fayda hai hamara hamara jisko ye cheez hum bik sakta hai waha par manne nahi kar pata hai to wo karne se kya fayda hai humko.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek bar na proper.
Customer: Aap log ko aap log ko sath koi business nahi hoga bhai sab.
Executive: Main nahi sir aise kyun nahi hoga business.
Customer: Ye nahi ho sakta hai nahi nahi ho sakta hai.
Executive: Ek bar sir agar aap online nahi ho sakta hai nahi nahi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Contact buyer contact buyer mein jab mangta hai koi ye nahi hota hai phone number aata nahi kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Sir aapko na ek bar proper guidance ki requirement hai Indiamart ko kaise chalana hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap humko guidance nahi chahiye 10 saal ho gaya aur guidance nahi chahiye hum log ko.
Executive: Sir bina guidance ke main aapko kaise help kar paungi ek bar aap video meeting se to aao.
Customer: 10 saal ho gaya aur help karne ka koi jarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Sir to aapne bhi to apna mehnat ka paisa Indiamart pe laga rakha hai na to aapko bhi wo samajhna padega na kaise.
Customer: Jo hoga hoga dekha jayega lekin Indiamart se humko bahut bahut taklif ho gaya 10 saal.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aap mujhe ye bataiye aap video meeting se kab available ho payenge.
Customer: Bahut kuch kuch kiya sorry don't mind please sorry.
Executive: Sir aap please sorry mat boliye main aapko bas ek cheez puch rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper buyleads.

- Contacted buyers are not responding.

- Feels Indiamart business policy is not effective.



Resolution:

- Executive offered proper guidance to the customer.

- Executive asked the customer to join video meeting.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, guidance, video meeting
